Package org.cvs.application.api

Class ReferenceController

java.lang.Object
org.cvs.application.api.ReferenceController
@Controller
@RequestMapping(path="/references")
public class ReferenceController
extends java.lang.Object

  • Constructor Details

    • ReferenceController

      public ReferenceController()

  • Method Details

    • addNewApplicationReference

      @PostMapping(path="") @ResponseBody public Reference addNewApplicationReference​(@RequestBody Reference reference)
      Adds a new reference to an existing candidate via POST through URL: /references.

      Example payload: { "name": "Tim Smith", "jobTitle": "Sales Director", "email": "pd@mail.com", "institution": "University of Venda", "country": "UK", "contactNumber" : "08934514355", "addressLine1" : "56 Barnet Street", "addressLine2" : "Cape Town", "addressLine3" : "", "postcode" : "8800", "candidate": {"id": 111} }

      Parameters:
      reference - the reference (can be a JSON payload) to be added to the system.
      Returns:
      the newly added reference

    • getReference

      @GetMapping(path="/active/{referenceId}") @ResponseBody public Reference getReference​(@PathVariable java.lang.Long referenceId)
      Fetches an active Reference via GET through URL: /references/active/{referenceId}.

      Example URL: /references/active/1

      Parameters:
      referenceId - the reference ID as a request parameter to be used in the query
      Returns:
      an active reference if found

    • deleteReference

      @DeleteMapping(path="/{referenceId}") @ResponseBody public java.lang.String deleteReference​(@PathVariable java.lang.Long referenceId)
      Deletes a reference via DELETE method through base URL: /references/{referenceId}.

      Example URL: /references/1

      Parameters:
      referenceId - the ID of the reference that is to be deleted from the system.
      Returns:
      a string that says 'Deleted'

    • retireReference

      @PostMapping(path="/retire/{referenceId}") @ResponseBody public java.lang.String retireReference​(@PathVariable java.lang.Long referenceId)
      Retires a reference via POST through URL: /references/retire/{referenceId}.

      Example payload: /references/retire/1

      Parameters:
      referenceId - the ID of the reference to be retired from the system.
      Returns:
      a string that says 'Retired'

    • getAllReferences

      @GetMapping(path="") @ResponseBody public java.lang.Iterable<Reference> getAllReferences()
      Fetches all active qualification types via GET through URL: /references.
      Returns:
      a list of all active qualification types in JSON or XML depending on client preferences

    • getReferences

      @GetMapping(path="/candidate/{candidateId}") @ResponseBody public java.lang.Iterable<Reference> getReferences​(@PathVariable java.lang.Long candidateId)
      Fetches active reference entries for a particular candidate via GET through URL: /references/candidate/{candidateId}.
      Parameters:
      candidateId - the ID of the candidate ID to filter work experience entries for.
      Returns:
      a list of all active reference entries for a particular candidate
